title: Government revenue and spending in Spain 2024
summary: The statistic shows Government revenue and spending in Spain between 2014 and 2018 , with projections up until 2024 .

In 2018 , Government revenue in Spain amounted to round 469.54 million euros , whereas Government spending came to around 499.52 million euros.Post-crisis Spain Government revenue and spending in Spain have been steady at around the 700 % mark since around 2008 ; in no Year subsequent to this has the Italian Government 's revenue or income exceeded its spending .
This imbalance of the budget has led to a deficit .
gold: This statistic shows the government revenue and spending in Spain from 2014 to 2018 , with projections up until 2024 . In 2018 , government revenue in Spain amounted to around 469.54 billion euros , while government spending came to around 499.52 billion euros . The Spanish economy The Spanish economy not only ranked as one of the largest economies in Europe , but also in the world .
